dct_title_s: Map of West Virginia showing railroads and county products
dct_description_sm: drawn from government and other surveys by Ray V. Hennen.
Covers West Virginia and the surrounding states.
"I.C. White, State Geologist. Morgantown, W. Va., October 1, 1905."

Includes text, indexed list of the "Principal products of the counties of West Virginia," basic census information, statewide production totals for coal, coke, petroleum, natural gas, and manufacturing industries for 1904, and table of Geological and Economic Survey commissioners.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
